name: Evo Chamber
description:
Be aware: this is a very early alpha preview

In Evo Chamber small square shaped creatures compete against each other for dominance in a changing environment. Each creature has different genes that enable various behavior types but come at an increased energy cost. If a species gives birth to a new generation there is a chance for mutation to occur which can alter the genes thus allowing new traits to emerge.

 Features: 

  • Customizable environment
  • Over 15 different gene traits allowing all kinds of specialized creatures
  • Each creatures appearance is based on its gene structure
  • Creature Editor
